recipe.title: Harira
recipe.ingredient: 1 TBsp corn flour (mixed with 2 TBsp water)
recipe.step: On stove top heat oil in large heavy based casserole type sauce pan.
Once hot cook garlic and meat in batches until brown all over.
Place all meat back in pan and cook with spices for a few minutes, until fragrant.
Stir in water, stock cubes, can tomatoes, chick peas and lentils.
Stir well to combine and bring to the boil.
Place lid on pot and pop in oven for 2 hours.
Remove pot from oven and stir in the corn flour and water mixture and the spinach, and season if necessary.
Place back in oven for 30 minutes.
Once done remove from oven and stir in lemon juice and sprinkle over coriander.
Serve with crusty bread, mash spud or rice.
